Articles.Content:
Here is a small and easy to fly launch vehicle with a size-able amount of delta-V for small craft fitting onto the 1.25m base. Download

Edited June 18, 2015 by Yaeah

Wow, this is incredibly nice Great work!

Repped!
Could you make a bigger 2.5 meter one, maybe using tweakscale.
Great looking design! What kind of payload can she get to LKO? Repped!

It looks like 5 tons is the limit with the current configuration, maybe I can increase it to 7-9 tons with a center stack engine modification. It's currently designed to be able to take small manned space craft to space stations, and small probes to munar expeditions (maybe farther, if you can fly it efficiently!)

Also, after testing it looks like the launch vehicle goes into a spin when heavily* loaded. I'll upload a fixed version in a few mins.
